title: Sengoku Musou: Mononofu-tachi no Sekigahara
original_name: 戦国無双 〜武士たちの関ヶ原〜
sinopse: Manga adaption of the popular action series, Sengoku Musou (Samurai Warriors). Consists of three chapters: "Chapter of Ishida Mitsunari", "Chapter of Date Masamune" and the "Chapter of Sanada Nobuyuki and Sanada Yukimura".
